messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] The Onion - Satire about starting school
messages.msgSnippet: When does the satire part start? Joylyn
messages.messageBody:
When does the satire part start?

Joylyn
---- g-liberatedlearning <liberatedlearning@...> wrote:
> My 17 yo son loves the Onion and is starting a college course today
> called Humor in Literature. He'll love this article from the Onion
> that a friend of mine forwarded to me. A poor six year old is just
> beginning to contemplate what 12 years of compulsory education means
> to him. http://www.theonion.com/content/news/
> 6_year_old_stares_down_bottomless
>
> Chris
> http://www.groups.yahoo.com/group/IAUnschoolers/
> http://www.zamunzo.blogspot.com/
>
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
>

messages.subject: The Onion - Satire about starting school
messages.msgSnippet: My 17 yo son loves the Onion and is starting a college course today called Humor in Literature.  He ll love this article from the Onion that a friend of mine
messages.messageBody:
My 17 yo son loves the Onion and is starting a college course today
called Humor in Literature. He'll love this article from the Onion
that a friend of mine forwarded to me. A poor six year old is just
beginning to contemplate what 12 years of compulsory education means
to him. http://www.theonion.com/content/news/
6_year_old_stares_down_bottomless

Chris
http://www.groups.yahoo.com/group/IAUnschoolers/
http://www.zamunzo.blogspot.com/



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
